Package io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio.file

package io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio.file
The file package of the PacIO library. It handles generic IO handling to the system's disk.

This package features two key classes: PacFile, and PacDirectory. PacFile is a class that is treated like a regular file in the system's disk, while PacDirectory is treated like a directory. These classes can be opened and closed via the Loadable interface, and saved via the Savable interface. Those classes are used to modify any file within the Pac-Man ROM set, and not just ROMs themselves.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio
    PacIO is a Java library used for accessing and modifying the Pac-Man ROM set, as well as the ROM files within it.
    io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio.util
    The utility package of the PacIO library.
  • Class
    Description
    Loadable
    An interface used for loading file objects to memory by "opening" them from the system's disk, and "closing" them, freeing the memory.
    PacDirectory
    A class that represents a directory in a file system.
    PacFile
    A class that represents a file in a file system.
    PacObject
    A class that represents a file object within the file system.
    Savable
    An interface used for saving file objects from memory to the system's disk.
